actions.committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

official_title: Honoring the Cultural Initiative, Inc. on the 20th anniversary of the first hip hop conference at Howard University.

summary.text: Honors the Cultural Initiative, Inc. on the 20th anniversary of the first hip hop conference at Howard University in the District of Columbia. (The Cultural Initiative, Inc. is a Howard University student-run corporation established to produce hip hop conferences and related projects.)

titles.title: Honoring the Cultural Initiative, Inc. on the 20th anniversary of the first hip hop conference at Howard University.
